text: Michael Earl Schoeffling (December 10, 1960 â€“ August 4, 2022) was an American actor and model. He was known for playing the role of Jake Ryan in Sixteen Candles, Al Carver in Wild Hearts Can't Be Broken, Kuch in Vision Quest, and Joe in Mermaids. ==Filmography== Film Year Film Role Notes 1984 Sixteen Candles Jake Ryan Racing with the Moon Amputee Soldier Uncredited 1985 Sylvester Matt Vision Quest Kenny "Kuch" Kuchera 1986 Let's Get Harry Corey Burck Belizaire the Cajun Hypolite Leger 1989 Longtime Companion Michael Slaves of New York Jan 1990 Mermaids Joe Perretti 1991 Wild Hearts Can't Be Broken Al Carver Television Year Title Role Notes 1986 The Hitchhiker Lance Episode: "Dead Man's Curve" ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1960 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:Models from Pennsylvania Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:Actors from Wilkes-Barre, Pennsylvania
